Message.title: Multiple Message Setup
Message.description: Customize almost every message your player sees. Any FlectonePulse action can be disabled.

Command.title: Over 30 Exciting Commands
Command.description: Make the chat more user-friendly. Players can also enjoy built-in mini-games.

Integration.title: Integration with Other Projects
Integration.description: Allow players to communicate across different platforms. Full integrations with Discord, Twitch, and Telegram.

Structure.title: FlectonePulse Plugin Structure
Structure.description: • The images folder contains all images used in the plugin, such as avatars and icons. • The libraries folder contains third-party libraries required for the plugin to function. • The localizations folder contains localization files for multi-language support. Includes en_us.yml and ru_ru.yml. • The commands.yml file contains settings for all commands available in the plugin. • The config.yml file contains the main plugin settings, including connection parameters and general options. • The integration.yml file contains integration settings for other plugins and services. • The message.yml file allows you to customize all messages displayed to players in-game. • The permission.yml file contains permission settings for various plugin features.
